events.title: Lena Baker is found guilty of murder

movie.title: Hope & Redemption: The Lena Baker Story
movie.plot: A chronicle of the life of Lena Baker, the first woman to be sent to the electric chair in Georgia for the murder of her employer, who forced her into sexual slavery.

movie.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
movie.plot: In 1971, twenty-four male students are selected to take on randomly assigned roles of prisoners and guards in a mock prison situated in the basement of the Stanford psychology building.
